SELECT -- a.id id, -- a.homestay_name homestayName, a.homestay_address homestayAddress, count( 1 ) count FROM homestay.order t INNER JOIN homestay.homestay_info a ON t.homestay_id = a.homestay_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.clean_status_code = 1
GROUP BY -- a.id, -- a.homestay_name, a.homestay_address

SELECT a.id id, a.homestay_name homestayName, a.homestay_address homestayAddress, count( 1 ) count FROM homestay.order t INNER JOIN homestay.homestay_info a ON t.homestay_id = a.homestay_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.clean_status_code = 1 AND a.homestay_address = #{homestayAddress} GROUP BY a.id, a.homestay_name, a.homestay_address
SELECT count( 1 ) total FROM homestay.order t INNER JOIN homestay.homestay_info a ON t.homestay_id = a.homestay_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.clean_status_code = 1

SELECT t.id, c.actual_clean_date, a.homestay_name, a.homestay_address, b.room_id, d.item_name roomType, c.staff_cost,
e.staff_name,
d.comments , c.is_first, c.boss_cost, t.pre_clean_date, f.item_name statusName FROM homestay.order t JOIN homestay.homestay_info a ON t.homestay_id = a.homestay_id JOIN homestay.room_info b ON t.room_id = b.room_id JOIN homestay.order_record c ON t.order_id = c.order_id JOIN homestay.dict_room_type d ON b.room_type = d.item_code
JOIN homestay.staff_info e ON c.staff_id = e.staff_id
JOIN homestay.dict_order_status f ON c.status = f.item_code WHERE 1 = 1
AND t.clean_status_code = #{params.cleanStatusCode}
AND a.homestay_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.homestayName},'%')
And b.room_id like CONCAT('%',#{params.roomId},'%')
AND a.homestay_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.homestayAddress},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.actual_clean_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{params.actualCleanDate}

SELECT c.room_id roomNum, b.operators_telephone operatorPhone, b.homestay_address address, g.clean_type_name cleanType, if(a.is_extra_bed=0,'是','否') extraBed, e.commission PercentMoney, b.homestay_name homeStayBrand FROM homestay.order t JOIN homestay.order_record a ON t.order_id = a.order_id JOIN homestay.homestay_info b ON t.homestay_id = b.homestay_id JOIN homestay.room_info c ON t.room_id = c.room_id JOIN homestay.staff_info d on a.staff_id = d.staff_id JOIN homestay.staff_commission e ON e.staff_id = d.staff_id JOIN homestay.dict_room_type f ON c.room_type = f.item_code JOIN homestay.dict_clean_type g ON t.clean_type = g.clean_type_code WHERE b.homestay_address = #{address} AND d.telphone = #{cleanerPhone}
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentDate}

SELECT c.room_id roomNo, b.homestay_name brand, b.homestay_address address, g.clean_type_name cleanType, if(a.is_extra_bed=0,'是','否') extraBed, a.staff_cost PercentMoney FROM homestay.order t JOIN homestay.order_record a ON t.order_id = a.order_id JOIN homestay.homestay_info b ON t.homestay_id = b.homestay_id JOIN homestay.room_info c ON t.room_id = c.room_id
JOIN homestay.staff_info d on d.staff_id = a.staff_id JOIN homestay.dict_clean_type g ON t.clean_type = g.clean_type_code WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.actual_clean_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{DateBegin} AND DATE_FORMAT(a.actual_clean_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{DateEnd} AND d.telphone=#{cleanerPhone}

SELECT t.room_id roomNo, b.item_name roomType, a.homestay_name homeStayBreand, a.homestay_id homestayId, a.homestay_address address, t.room_password cleanPwd, c.clean_type_name cleanType, if(e.is_extra_bed=0,'是','否') extraBed FROM homestay.room_info t JOIN homestay.homestay_info a ON t.homestay_id = a.homestay_id JOIN homestay.dict_room_type b ON t.room_type = b.item_code JOIN homestay.ORDER d ON d.homestay_id = t.homestay_id AND d.room_id = t.room_id JOIN homestay.order_record e ON e.order_id = d.order_id JOIN homestay.dict_clean_type c ON c.clean_type_code = d.clean_type
